attributes.action: Tax companies that use excessive packaging, Ban the distribution of unrecyclable plastic carriers bags and thereby encourage everyone to use 'bags for life' when they go shopping.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A group of Year 5 primary school children at International Community School in London feel passionately about their own contribution to help stop global warming.  They would like you to sign this petition so we stop filling our landfill sites with so much plastic waste.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
